DOC.brief_title: The Effects Thrust Joint Manipulation Resting Contracting Thickness Transversus Abdominis Subjects With Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Patients low back pain ( LBP ) undergo ultrasound image transversus abdominis measure muscle thickness rest contract state prior intervention immediately intervention . In randomized controlled trial , patient randomize one two group . One group receive intervention thrust joint manipulation lumbar spine group receive intervention non-thrust joint manipulation lumbar spine .
DOC.criteria: Adults 1870 year age primary symptom LBP , without referral low extremity . Subjects must able read write English . Presence serious pathology . Diagnosis spinal stenosis symptom low leg ( change sensation , muscle weakness ) . Any history low back surgery , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis , osteopenia , scoliosis , ankylose spondylitis . Pregnancy Pending legal action . Prior surgery lumbar spine fracture lumbar spine .
